short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Emoji Easy is a text editor with emoji, easy to copy and paster emojis.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Emoji Easy is a text editor with emoji, you can easily enter text with emoji in your browser.
You just need to pick your favorite emoji, the system will automatically copy your edited text to the clipboard, and you can copy the edited text to any editor that does not support emoji packages.
